page.title: 1720TH CENTURY NACKINGTON
page.content: {The Kent Constabulary No 3 Area Traf- {fic Office}was built in 1979. The function of the department is to act as a back-up service for all traffic problems and if necessary support the Drug and other Police Squads in East Kent. 120 staff are employed, about 1/3 civilian the rest Police Officers, including 2 females. Most of the civi- lians carry out clerical and data processing duties, working office hours with the option to be flexible, referred to as "flexy hours". Police Officers are usually uniformed and use white motor cars with high intensity striping, distinguishing them from other units of the Police Force. A vehicle workshop is also sited here which deals with regular servicing of Police vehicles as well as repairs.The staff in the workshop are civilians.
